publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1915 Dr Winnie Ewing: Caithness General Hospital—That the Parliament supports Caithness General Hospital in Wick in continuing to supply specialist maternity and gynaecological services and opposes the downgrading of these services.
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1915 Dr Winnie Ewing: Caithness General Hospital—That the Parliament supports Caithness General Hospital in Wick in continuing to supply specialist maternity and gynaecological services and opposes the downgrading of these services. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Neil*
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-1915 Dr Winnie Ewing: Caithness General Hospital—That the Parliament supports Caithness General Hospital in Wick in continuing to supply specialist maternity and gynaecological services and opposes the downgrading of these services. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Jamie Stone, Alex Neil, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1915 Caithness General Hospital (lodged on 8 May 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona McLeod*
